raw_text: EDIRISINGHE – KAMALA MALINI – Dearly beloved wife of late Dr E.M.S. Edirisinghe,​ loving mother of Nalaka & Nayomi,​ loving mother-in-law of Ashok Muniappan,​ loving grandmother of Kumar,​ Krishantha,​ Nitin & Nikhil,​ daughter of late Dhammadasa Arandara & late Allen Perera,​ sister of late Paul Siriveera,​ late Prema Perera,​ Nanda Ranasinghe and Milton Arandara. Cortege leaves residence on Saturday 14th at 4.45 p.m. for Cremation at Borella Kanatte 5.30 p.m. 506/​2,​ Elvitigala Mw.,​ Col. 15.066346

PERUSINGHE – KESHINI – Wife of late Haritha,​ mother of Dulantha,​ mother-in-law of Onella,​ daughter of late Herbert (Bertie) and Ethal Perera,​ sister of late Nilanthi Sirisena,​ daughter-in-law of Henry and Sona. Cortege leaves residence 50,​ Perera Mawatha,​ Panadura,​ on Saturday 14th October at 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at Minuwanpitiya Cemetery at 5 p.m. No flowers please. Donations to any charity of your choice.066347

UDUWAWALA – PADMINI – Beloved wife of the late Edmund Uduwawala,​ loving mother of Nalin (UK),​ Nirmala and Senaka,​ mother-in-law of Chrishanthi and Nilakshi,​ grandmother of Shamendra and Rosy,​ Chandi and Jessica Sewwandhi and Nipuna,​ Nelum and Heshan,​ great grandmother of Thilini and Eshin,​ expired. Cremation on Saturday,​ 14th October at Mahaiyawa Cemetery,​ Kandy at 1.00 p.m. Cortege leaves residence : 52,​ Bahirawakanda Path,​ Kandy at 12 p.m.065793
